answers.answer: No but b glad... means ur diet is working. Wish i could say the same
I think it's normal. When I was on it with my last pregnancy I was losing weight and My doctor didn't seem concerned.
Ok thanks. I have gained 25 pounds so far and now it stopped. I was just concerned because I thought u gained the most weight I. your last trimester.

I am following my nutritionist advices for my diet and have lost 20 pounds since begin of my prenancy. I took back 3 pounds in the last 2 months and every healthcare professionals seem ok with it. Baby Scott growth is normal. I'm 23 weeks. As long as you aren't hungry all the time, baby and you are get what you need.

question: Since being on the gd diet I haven't gained any weight. I'm 31 weeks and have been on the diet for 4 weeks. Is this normal?
title: gestational diabetes diet.
